wallet.scan_qr: Scan this QR Code or copy the below address to receive funds

update.infotext:
We found data from an old RaspiBlitz on your HDD/SSD.
You can now start the UPDATE to version {{version}}. You will need to set a new Password A for the SSH login.
All your channels will stay open and other passwords will stay the same.
Please make sure to have your seed words & static channel backup file (just in case).
Do you want to start the UPDATE of your RaspiBlitz now?

recovery.infotext:
We found data from an existing RaspiBlitz on your HDD/SSD.
You can now start the RECOVERY to freshly build your system based on the existing configuration & data. This process is often used to repair broken features or clean the system up.
You will need to set a new Password A for the SSH login. All other passwords will stay the same and channels will stay open.
Please make sure to have your seed words & static channel backup file (just in case).
Do you want to start the RECOVERY of your RaspiBlitz now?

migration.infotext:
RaspiBlitz found data from {{type}}.
You can migrate your blockchain & LND data (funds & channels) over to RaspiBlitz.
Please make sure to have your {{type}} seed words & static channel backup file (just in case). Also any data of additional apps you had installed on {{type}} might get lost.
Do you want to start the MIGRATION to RaspiBlitz now?

passwords.infotext:
You will need to set new passwords.
RaspiBlitz works with 3 different passwords:
PASSWORD A) Main User Password (SSH & WebUI, sudo)
PASSWORD B) APP Password (Additional Apps & API)
PASSWORD C) Lightning Wallet Password for Unlock
You will need to set now Password: ${passwordinfo}
(other passwords might stay like on your old node)
Follow Password Rules: Minimal of 8 chars,
no spaces and only special characters - or .
Write them down & store them in a safe place.
passwords.pass_info: min 8 characters, 1 word, chars & numbers accepted, no special characters allowed
